name: Bird Theif(birdjam1)
description:
A game where you have to steal the human's stuff!

WASD to move, E to grab and let go of objects. There are 5 objects you can grab, and they must all be delivered to the nest. But if you're spotted, you'll be attacked, and that would be bad :(

Music by Kevin MacLeod. Available under the Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported license(chipper): https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?isrc=USUAN1100844

Free Assets from Kenny's assets: https://kenney.nl/
